ygData.subject: water crystal staff
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, the water crystal staff isn t the one that looks like a little purple ice cream cone does it?  :)  Getting me curious now...maybe I ll spend some time
ygData.messageBody:
Hey, the water crystal staff isn't the one that looks like a little purple
ice cream cone does it? :) Getting me curious now...maybe I'll spend some
time sitting my butt down in Rathe tonight to see if he shows up. hehe

One another note...for the person who asked about a Wizard's guild on
Veeshan. There isn't any. Just a whole lot of powergamers. :) The
infamous FoH guild comes to mind, along with the Companions, and Aradani as
some of the other bigger ones.

Guildless,
-- Lim'Dul
